definition: the person or thing that is rejected or set aside as inferior in quality, dismiss from consideration or a contest
details:
noun
- the person or thing that is rejected or set aside as inferior in quality
= synonyms: cull
verb
- dismiss from consideration or a contest
= synonyms: eliminate, rule out, winnow out
- refuse to accept or acknowledge
= example: refuse to accept or acknowledge
- reject with contempt
= synonyms: disdain, scorn, turn down, spurn, freeze off, pooh-pooh
- deem wrong or inappropriate
= synonyms: disapprove
- refuse to accept
= synonyms: dishonor
- refuse entrance or membership
= synonyms: refuse, turn down, turn away
- resist immunologically the introduction of some foreign tissue or organ
= example: resist immunologically the introduction of some foreign tissue or organ
= synonyms: refuse, resist
